channel.title: Pdf on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Pdf on Arrans github.io

item.title: paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx
item.description: A community-supported supercharged document management system: scan, index and archive all your documents

item.title: microsoft/markitdown
item.description: Python tool for converting files and office documents to Markdown.

item.title: koodo-reader/koodo-reader
item.description: A modern ebook manager and reader with sync and backup capacities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS and Web

item.title: posquit0/Awesome-CV
item.description: 📄 Awesome CV is LaTeX template for your outstanding job application

item.title: koreader/koreader
item.description: An ebook reader application supporting PDF, DjVu, EPUB, FB2 and many more formats, running on Cervantes, Kindle, Kobo, PocketBook and Android devices

item.title: mfts/papermark
item.description: Papermark is the open-source DocSend alternative with built-in analytics and custom domains.

item.title: siyuan-note/siyuan
item.description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

item.title: xournalpp/xournalpp
item.description: Xournal++ is a handwriting notetaking software with PDF annotation support. Written in C++ with GTK3, supporting Linux (e.g. Ubuntu, Debian, Arch, SUSE), macOS and Windows 10. Supports pen input from devices such as Wacom Tablets.

item.title: Kareadita/Kavita
item.description: Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with the goal of being a full solution for all your reading needs. Setup your own server and share your reading collection with your friends and family.

item.title: ether/etherpad-lite
item.description: Etherpad: A modern really-real-time collaborative document editor.

item.title: ONLYOFFICE/DesktopEditors
item.description: Open-source office suite pack that comprises all the tools you need to work with documents, spreadsheets, presentations, PDFs, and PDF forms on Windows, Linux, and macOS

item.title: johnfercher/maroto
item.description: A maroto way to create PDFs. Maroto is inspired in Bootstrap and uses gofpdf. Fast and simple.

item.title: mrmn2/PdfDing
item.description: Selfhosted PDF manager, viewer and editor offering a seamless user experience on multiple devices.

item.title: boxesandglue/boxesandglue
item.description: PDF rendering library for Go using TeX algorithms.
